long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension wraps the Chrome downloads API and makes download information available as a JSON file.

Unless you are in interested in examining the raw JSON information that Chrome makes available, this is probably not for you.

On installation, it populates an IndexedDB with current downloads information.

If active, it listens to updates to downloads and logs updates to the database.

The information can be downloaded as downloads.json by clicking on the extension.

The extension doesn't send or receive any data, or indeed do anything not described above, apart from log to the JavaScript console.

Change Log

0.0.0.4 only grab full downloads snapshot on DB initialisation

0.0.0.3 rename everything from dd to dl; update logo to DL; add missing semicolon; add ISO date time to download file name

0.0.0.2 switch to logging rather than processing events as the event handling was buggy and it's useful to get the original event stream for testing outside a browser; rename to match

0.0.0.1 initial version
